charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-Defendant did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute cocaine base ("crack"), a Schedule II controlled substance. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Time served followed by 3 years supervised release; submit to alcohol and drug testing as directed; submit to substance abuse evaluation and complete treatment as directed; submit to mental health evaluation and complete treatment as directed; $100 special assessment (1)

charges.charge_description: Defendant did (1) Knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance, namely containing cocaine base, in violation of 21, U.S.C., Section 841(a)(1). (2) Knowingly possess a firearm which has had the manufacturer's serial number altered and has been shipped in interstate commerce, in violation of Title 18, U.S.C., Section 922(k) [5:99-m-3]
